p: We found that immune deficiency was associated with ICU admission and death in influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 patients. Lynfield et al. found that immune deficiency was the only comorbidity associated with death in hospitalized A(H1N1)pdm09 patients [ 25] and Alvarez Lerma et al. [ 24] found an association between A(H1N1)pdm09 patients who died and immunosuppression. In studies that did not separate by type/subtype, an association was found between immunosuppression and ICU admission or death [ 13, 29].
